00038 enum DRAMCmd {READ, WRITE, PRECHARGE, ACTIVATE, ALL_BANK_REFRESH};
00039 typedef DRAMCmd DRAMCmd;
00040 
00041 enum BurstLength {READL, WRITEL, PREFETCHL, WRITEBACKL, NORMAL};
00042 typedef BurstLength BurstLength;
00043 
00044 struct DRAMCmdState
00045 {
00046         DRAMCmd cmd;
00047         Request req;
00048         BurstLength burst;
00049         void set(DRAMCmd cmdS, BurstLength burstL, Request reqI)
00050         {
00051             cmd = cmdS;
00052             req = reqI; 
00053             burst = burstL;
00054             
00055             if (burst == READL)
00056                 req.data.size = READ_SIZE;      
00057             if (burst == WRITEL)
00058                 req.data.size = WRITE_SIZE;
00059             else if (burst == PREFETCHL)
00060                 req.data.size = PREFETCH_SIZE;
00061             else if (burst == WRITEBACKL)
00062                 req.data.size = WRITEBACK_SIZE; 
00063         }
00064         DRAMCmdState () 
00065         {
00066             cmd = PRECHARGE;
00067             burst = NORMAL;             
00068         };
00069         ~DRAMCmdState () { };
00070 };
00071 typedef DRAMCmdState DRAMCmdState;
00072 typedef vector<DRAMCmdState> CmdQueue;
00073 
00074 enum RankBankComb {SAME, DIFF};
00075 
00076 struct BankState
00077 {
00078     unsigned long long int prevRow;
00079     DRAMCmd prevCmd;
00080     Time prevCmdTime;
00081     BankState ()
00082     {
00083         prevRow = 0;
00084         prevCmd = PRECHARGE;
00085         prevCmdTime = 0;                
00086     }   
00087 };
00088 typedef BankState BankState; 
00089 
00090 struct RankState
00091 {
00092         vector<BankState> bank;
00093         RankState()
00094         {
00095             bank.resize(NO_OF_BANKS);
00096         }
00097 };
00098 typedef RankState RankState;
00099 
00100 struct ChannelState
00101 {
00102         vector<RankState> rank;
00103         unsigned int prevCmdRank;
00104         unsigned int prevCmdBank;
00105         Time prevCmdTime;
00106         DRAMCmdState cmd;
00107         ChannelState()
00108         {
00109             rank.resize(NO_OF_RANKS);
00110         }
00111 };
00112 typedef ChannelState ChannelState;
